mapper.insert: insert into item (itemtitle, itemprice, itemabstract, itemcontent, imagelocation,sellerid,locationtype) values (#{itemTitle},#{itemPrice},#{itemAbstract},#{itemContent},#{imageLocation},#{sellerId},#{locationType})
mapper.delete: update item set valid = "false" where itemid=#{itemId}
mapper.select: select I.*, sum(T.count) as count from item I left join Trade T on I.itemid = T.itemid where I.valid = "true" and I.itemId = #{itemId}
